mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sm_product_answer (id, user_id, product_id, board_id, subject, content, secret_flag, group_no, level_no) VALUES (qna_id_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{productId}, 2, #{subject}, #{content}, #{secretFlag}, qna_id_seq.currval, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, id, product_id AS productId, regdate, subject, content, board_id as boardId, answer_flag AS answerFlag, secret_flag AS secretFlag, group_no as groupNo, level_no as levelNo FROM SM_product_answer WHERE product_id = #{productId}

SELECT user_id AS userId, id, product_id AS productId, regdate, subject, content, board_id as boardId, answer_flag AS answerFlag, group_no as groupNo, level_no as levelNo FROM SM_product_answer WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT user_id AS userId, id, product_id AS productId, regdate, subject, content, board_id as boardId, answer_flag AS answerFlag, group_no as groupNo, level_no as levelNo FROM SM_product_answer order by regdate desc
